name: teresa m shradar
coverLetter: I have been trimming for the last 10-12 yrs for my husband (medical). I am old school with scissors and have wanted to try the new electric ones. I have never timed or weighed what I trim. I am a hard worker, fast learner and I don't smoke cigs or marijuana willing to take a drug test and criminal background check.. I have enjoyed starting them from seed and watching them turn into this amazing plant that can help with the pain that my husband deals with daily. I am available during the day 5am- 6pm. Would love full time but would accept anything.
